Articles.Content:
oops wrong thread

Now you gotta tell me what it said!

Now you gotta tell me what it said!

I was going to request a flag by posting the URL but it failed and when I posted it it just showed the URL instead of the image. I decided to lie about making that mistake as I should have known that would happen.

I was going to request a flag by posting the URL but it failed and when I posted it it just showed the URL instead of the image. I decided to lie about making that mistake as I should have known that would happen.

ha! but i got you ;P

Forgot to save the .psd file so I had to start it again! Didn't take too long though How're these?

http://i.imgur.com/CB0rEmh.png

http://i.imgur.com/hAX4GU9.png

http://i.imgur.com/tKT8szl.png

I think thy all look class thanks! I think the one in the middle is best tho, with the border around the Shamrock and no blue flame

I think thy all look class thanks! I think the one in the middle is best tho, with the border around the Shamrock and no blue flame

Fair enough, I thought I'd try a few different ones All happy or is there anything else you want on it?

Your flags are pretty nice!!

Edited March 20, 2014 by OrianCEV
Wow, your flags are awesome! Are requests open?

Hello!

I got a flag from this thread a loooong time ago and I'm very happy with it, but in preparation for .23.5, I'd like a version without the "wavy" effect, so I can have the the logo on the sides of my rockets.

Here is the .png I'm currently using:

How feasible/easy is this? And thanks in advance!

Can you make a flag for me? The following image is what I want it to look like. The reason I want to you to make it is because I made this in Paint, and I know that you make make a much more high-resolution version. Thanks!

How feasible/easy is this? And thanks in advance!

GIMP-fu!

Can you make a flag for me? The following image is what I want it to look like. The reason I want to you to make it is because I made this in Paint, and I know that you make make a much more high-resolution version. Thanks!

But KSP flags are a lot smaller than that.

GIMP-fu!

Thank you xD. I've used GIMP a few times to turn white backgrounds transparent, but my fu was not strong enough for this task.

But KSP flags are a lot smaller than that.

Thanks for informing me, I didn't know that.

Request:

A space logo with our without a rocket that incorporates a Baseball instead of a globe. In my head, I see a globe with comets or asteroids wizzing around, but upon further inspection it isn't a globe but a baseball. Maybe similar to the NASA logo, but baseball inspired.

Agency name? AVERAGE

Literally just the word "AVERAGE" instead of NASA or ESA or other agency name. Go wild. Have fun. Preferably one with wavy-flag background, one without.

Too much to ask? Sorry in advance. You all rock.

A request,

Could you make a flag that is tan with a purple silhouette of Blitzwing in about this pose http://imgur.com/0g1nUcI with some details pick out like the canopy in yellow, His visor in red, and a bit of the chest details. Oh and his sword. Any maybe if you feel like it a version with his tan bits picked out as well.

Thank you for your time.

Sorry, Double post caused by bad internet.

Edited March 28, 2014 by MinerEdgar
Double Post, Sorry
Could somebody turn this flag http://imgur.com/pvKxCoD that I made into a good circular logo for .23.5?

Could somebody turn this flag http://imgur.com/pvKxCoD that I made into a good circular logo for .23.5?

What does that mean?
I think a circle on a transparent background to put on ships and capsules.
I didn't even know KSP could handle transparency on flags but here you go.

I didn't even know KSP could handle transparency on flags but here you go.

-snip-

Haven't seen the nasa flag, eh. I'm sure it's just white where it's supposed to be transparent.

Give me an image to work with and I'll see what I can do.

Also my current mission flag, a picture of myself as a baby.

-creepy effing snips-

Sorry, but i have a POS mac. You can't paint for some reason.
can someone make this into a flag
Aye!
How about an Autobot and Decpticon Sigil pair of flags?
I'll let someone else do that
